sentence: How do your community view people who attend school and who does not?

What are the people who grow crops called? Do they only grow crops or are they engaged in other activities as well? What kind of other activities are they engaged in?
Tell the names of at least 5 vegetables that are grown in your community
In which months / seasons are these vegetables grown?
What is the process of growing these vegetables?
